name: Technology Blockade
desc: OP - %s

name: Galatia Underachiever
desc: Command points -%s at the beginning of the battle, and command point recovery rate -%s during the whole battle

name: Besieged
desc: At the start of a battle, available deployment points are reduced by %s of the battle size

name: Arms Limitation Treaty
short: Limit mixing different design types of ships
desc: When the fleet contains ships of more than %s different design types, decreases max CR by %s at maximum

name: Deep Space Phobia
short: Decrease the performance of sensors in hyperspace
desc: While in hyperspace,the sensor strength x %s, sensor profile and detected range x %s

name: Ancient Threat
short: Reduce max combat readiness in remnant system
desc: Max combat readiness -%s in the remnant system

name: The Detente
short: Increase supplies cost for large fleets
desc: If the number of fleet members exceeds %s, the supplies cost per month of all ships will be increased by %s for each additional ship

name: Blood Lust
short: Reduce the max CR if you don't fight
desc: If player does not engage in any battles for %s days, max CR will be reduced by %s
extra1: You and your crew have %s days to endure...
extra2: You and your crew need a hearty battle...

name: John Wick
desc: If the assignment target of hostile fleets was player's fleet, those fleet's max burn level + %s

name: Low Efficiency Repair
desc: Fleetwide repair and combat readiness recover rate - %s

name: Dangerous Sector
desc: Special terrain effect to combat readiness decreases x %s

name: Naval Arms Race
desc: Enemy damage x %s

name: Guard Fleet
desc: Enemy damage taken x %s

name: Striker School
short: Increase the performance of enemy carriers
desc: Enemy replacement recover rate + %s, drop rate - %s, fighter replacement speed + %s

name: Layered Armor
desc: Enemy armor + %s for calculation only, and fighters only take %s bonus

name: Explosive Sniper
short: Increase the speed of enemy missiles
desc: Enemy missile flight speed + %s and maneuverability + %s

name: Low Compatibility
desc: Repair time and damage taken by the ship's engines and weapons x %s

name: Wholesale Shells
desc: Weapons shooting ballistic-type projectile have a %s chance to deal %s times damage

name: Emergent Airforce Rebuild
desc: Fighters' damage and resistance are affected by the replacement rate; when the rate is at %s, fighters' performance - %s

name: Overwhelming Vision
desc: Enemy weapon and sensor range + %s

name: Blocked Flux Conduits
short: Decrease flux dissipation while shield is on
desc: While the shield of player's ship is on, based on the active arc of the shield, the flux dissipation -%s

name: Century War
desc: Enemy stations take %s less damage and have %s longer weapon range

name: Fragment Graveyard
desc: Wreckage from destroyed ships is increased in speed by %s and mass by %s.

name: Order 66
desc: Friendly fire damage + %s

name: Phasing Ghost
desc: Every %s seconds, the enemy has a %s chance of receiving reinforcements from a phase ship. A successful reinforcement reduces the chance of the next reinforcement to %s x, a failure increases the probability of the next reinforcement to %s x. Phase ships spawn near random enemy ships, limited to Afflictor, Shade, Harbinger and Doom, with the probability of spawning depending on the biggest hull size on the field.

name: Danger Zone
short: Enemy ships will keep laying mines
desc: Every single enemy ship keep laying mines around players' ship every %s/%s/%s/%s seconds, dealing %s high-explosive damage.

name: Trade Embargo
desc: Every hostile market near the player's colony within %s LY reduces accessibility by %s

name: Spy
desc: Every hostile market near the player's colony within %s LY reduces stability by %s

name: Fraudulent
short: Potential loss of credits in each transaction
desc: Each time player makes a trade, there is a %s probability that %s of this gain will be deducted. The probability is doubled when the trade takes place on the black market.
extra1: Because of the payment security breach, you lost %s

name: No Way Back
short: Decrease the number of rules reselection
desc: The rate of gaining specialist rule reselections x %s (once a year becomes once every %s years)

name: Work Harder!
desc: When the ratio of marines to crew is lower than %s, there is a %s chance of riot per day, which will cause a random ship to lose %s combat readiness, and %s of crew will die from this riot
extra1: Crews riot, %s suffer an accident! %s crews dead...
extra2: You need %s more marines to suppress the riot!

name: Monotonous Teller
desc: Every %s days, lose %s story point (cannot drop below zero)
extra1: The upper narrative audience thinks your story is still not good enough, deducting your %s story points...

name: Inflation
short: Money is becoming less and less valuable
desc: Every month,  lose %s credits
extra1: Capital manipulated world evaporated your %s star coins

name: Technological Revolution
desc: OP + %s . While the fleet total dp (non-civilian ships) reached %s, the bonus starts to decay, at most -%s

name: HSS Phoenix
short: Increase the performance of Flagship: Onslaught
desc: When the flagship is an Onslaught series ship, the ship gains %s hitpoints, armor, flux performance and %s max speed and maneuverability, %s max combat readiness.

name: TTS Invicible
short: Increase the performance of Flagship: Paragon
desc: When the flagship is a Paragon series ship, the ship gains %s shield unfold, turn rate, uppkeep performance and %s weapon damage and fire rate, %s max combat readiness.

name: Shield Specialization
desc: Shield resistance, turn and unfold rate +%s, upkeep cost -%s

name: Stay Calm
desc: If the total damage of the missile/torpedo hitting the flagship within %s seconds exceeds %s of the max hitpoints, the time flow rate becomes %s for %s seconds. This effect has a cooldown of {%s} seconds.

name: Gravity Disruptor
desc: The time scale of player's ships +%s, enemy ships -%s

name: Cruising Hunting
desc: Player cruisers' deployment points -%s or %s (whichever is greater)

name: EW Smog
desc: Maximum ECM rating + %s

name: Optimised Derelict Processing
desc: Increases the resources gained from salvaging abandoned stations, derelicts, floating hulks, and others by %s (including rare items)

name: Voyager
desc: Fuel consumption x %s

name: Storm Rider
desc: Your fleet is immune to damage from hyperspace storms

name: Bustling Fungus
short: Lower maintenance cost while staying still
desc: After being immobile for %s day(s), ships' repair speed + %s,maintenance - %s

name: Sneaker
desc: Increase %s max burn level when player fleet is in slow move or "Go Dark"

name: Thermodynamics
desc: Max burn level increased to "max" when triggered "Emergency Burn"

name: Endurance
desc: Once a player ship's CR falls below %s of the max CR, it directly gains the CR value for one deployment of the required CR. The cooldown time for this effect is %s days per ship.

name: Logistics Overhaul
desc: Max Logistics Hullmod + %s

name: Wide-area Radar
desc: Ships' sensor strength + %s

name: Elite Reserves
desc: Extra crews can provide extra combat readiness up to %s

name: Guide to Dogfighting
desc: While the base range of a weapon is lower than or equal to %s and it shots projectiles, it has +%s damage

name: I Have the High Ground!
short: Increase weapon range when close to objectives
desc: When within %s range of an objective, player/ally ships' weapon range +%s

name: Naval Phalanx
short: Increase the shield resistance & flux dissipation when ships gather
desc: When a friendly ship is within %s range, player/ally ships' shield resistance and dissipation x %s

name: Experimental Shunt
desc: Gain %s hard flux dissipation while in combat.

name: Critical Hit
short: Flagship has chance to do double damage
desc: Any damage dealt by the flagship has a %s chance of being doubled (only shown when the original damage is above 100)

name: Lucky Seven
desc: Any %s th non-beam weapon damage dealt by the flagship will be increased by %s or %s or...?

name: Seer
desc: Every %s seconds, clear the fog of war for %s seconds

name: Son of Core
short: Reduce the damage from automated ships
desc: Ballistic/Energy/Missile weapon damage from enemy automated ships -%s

name: Headhunting
short: Command the fleet to hunt the target
desc: After the player issues an eliminate command to an enemy target, for %s seconds, that target takes %s more damage and canceling the eliminate command does not end the effect. This ability has a cooldown of %s seconds. When issuing commands to multiple targets, take the last one.
extra2: The next hunt is ready to go...

name: Collector
short: Flagship can instantly kill low HP enemy ship
desc: If the flagship deals hull damage to an enemy ship whose hit points is less than or equal to %s, execute the ship and gain %s. Not valid for fighters.

name: V for Vent
desc: Repeatedly pressing the %s key (for %s of a second at a time) while the player's flagship is venting will increase the vent rate by %s (%s times stackable).

name: Let there be Light!
short: Increase flagship's beam damage to shield
desc: Flagship's beam damage to shield + %s

name: Mercantilism
desc: Increase the accessibility of colonies for up to %s, if the accessibility is above %s then bonus will be %s

name: GLaDos
short: Increase the supply bonus from Alpha core
desc: Add %s supply in industries with an alpha core
extra1: Thank you for choosing me, I will take care of your colonies with alpha cores.

name: Industrial Zone
short: Increase the max amount of industry facilities
desc: Increase the max amount of industry by %s, but when colony size is lower than or equal to %s, additional industry will suffer from supply -%s

name: Black in Black
desc: All factions maintain minimum suspicion of you in the black market

name: Make an Exception
desc: When the player is not hostile with the Hegemony, the AI Inspection has a %s probability of insiders appearing to help the player set things right with money
extra1: Some people help you sort everything out on the Hegemony AI Inspection...

name: Tachyon Labour
desc: When selected for the first time, set the relationship between the player and the remnant to %s

name: Full of Company
desc: When selected for the first time, set the relationship between the player and the independents/pirates to %s

name: Yin
desc: After the Specialist mode rule is selected and confirmed, the rule will be deleted and an unselected %s is added at random. When "Yang" is selected, the unselected %s will also be randomized.

name: Yang
desc: After the Specialist mode rule is selected and confirmed, the rule will be deleted and an unselected %s is added at random. When "Yang" is selected, the unselected %s will also be randomized.

name: When it rains, it pours
desc: After the Specialist mode rule is selected and confirmed, the rule will be deleted and %s unselected %s are added at random.

name: Amnesia
desc: After the Specialist mode rule is selected and confirmed, the rule will be deleted and an selected %s will be removed at random.

name: Premium Seafood
desc: Get %s lobster every day when cargo is not full

name: Birthday Present
short: Gain positive rule after one year
desc: After the Specialist mode rule is selected and confirmed and %s year later, the rule will be deleted and an unselected positive rule is added at random. (You could repick the rules and maintain this rule, the time that you get the extra rule will not be affected)
extra2: You will receive your birthday gift on %s-%s-%s .

name: Entropius Mind
short: Change all the rules each week
desc: Each week, all rules are randomly shuffled back, and several positive or negative rules are selected at complete random.
extra1: You are suddenly in a trance...
extra2: There are %s days until the next random
source: The God who rolls the dice

name: Still Growing Up
short: Gain a positive rule every few months
desc: Gain a positive rule every few months,"After selecting this rule, you can get a positive rule at random every few months (you can't get golden/milestone rules, and rules with low cost are preferred). The interval at the beginning is %s months, and for each acquisition, the next interval increases by %s months.
extra2: There are %s months until your next growth
source: "Thirty years of river east, thirty years of river west, do not bully the youth poor!"

name: Symbol Perseus
short: Show the power of continuous overcoming
desc: In %s seconds, if the flagship continually disable/destroy %s ships, every next continue-disable will gains %s of max flux dissipated bonus.
source: "Thou, witness the heavenly might of the Emperor."
